Entries.Trinnie: ITS THE MOST WONDERFUL TIME OF THE YEAAAAAR!#$b#Im so happy my dad actually gave me a beautiful dollhouse!!$h
Entries.Yuuma: Before this year ends, I hope that the stars will bless Shiro#$b#I hope for his happiness and health.
Entries.Alissa: Tis the season to be jolly! Fa la la la la la la la la!$h
Entries.Alissa_spouse: Hey Mister!^Hey Missy!#$b#You owe me a kiss! I was waiting for you under the mistletoe earlier!
Entries.Corine: Have you already thought of things that youre grateful for?#$b#I hope you have an even better new year$h
Entries.Corine_spouse: Youre a great blessing and I cant imagine life without you$l#$b#Thank you for making the year and the next years a great one$h
Entries.Flor: Have you heard the story of the Winter star?#$b#Willy tells the story beautifully.
Entries.Flor_spouse: Happy holidays to you love, may the next year bring us bountiful produce and a happy family.$h#$e#Thank you for being here with me
Entries.Ian: The Feast of the Winterstar has  been one of the best festivities we have! I really enjoyed decorating the tree with the Mayor and Ms. Lenny$h
Entries.Ian_spouse: I think itd be fun to grow a pine tree on our farm.#$b#We could decorate it every winter and have fun with our kids when we decide to have them right?$h
Entries.Jeric: This year was a bountiful harvest!$h#$b#Hopefully the next year would bring in more crops and produce!#$e#If ever you need help with your farm, dont hesitate to tell me alright?
Entries.Jeric_spouse: Ive been dreaming of a family of my own$l#$b#You gave me that dream. I know its just us two for now, but were still considered a family right?
Entries.Kenneth: Oh dear, I hope that the many lights on the tree wont cause  a power surge.$u
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: Baby, you light up my world like nobody else.$l#$b#Being the way that you are is enough and everyone else in the room can see it.$l#$bIm the luckiest guy here$h
Entries.Maddie: Im looking forward for this festival to end#$b#UGH$a
Entries.Maddie_spouse: Thank you @, for making this drab world less annoying$l#$b#I hope the new year would bring us bliss$h
Entries.Philip: I hope you have a joyful new year!#$b#Always remember to take care of yourself and exercise okay?#$e#You wouldnt want to get sick and immobile now would we?
Entries.Philip_spouse: Your hand fits in mine like its made just for me. It went in my mind that it mustve been meant to be. It all just makes sense because youre here with me now$l
Entries.Shiro: You know what @? Its important to make the most out of every moment#$e#Live youre your life to the fullest while youre still complete.#$b#You never know what might go missing one day.$s
Entries.Shiro_spouse: Ive lived. You know?#$b#I cant say that Ive lived a full life.But Ive lived.$s#$e#I almost died, Im still sick... I lost all hope before because it was so hard.#$b#But you are here despite all that. And Im glad you stuck with me through it all.#$b#Im so lucky to have you. Im so grateful for you$h
Entries.Ysabelle: I hope someone gives me new pointes$s#$b#My old ones a little too unsteady for me
Entries.Ysabelle_spouse: Im so happy that youre here with me love!$h#$b#Youre the best gift I have ever received!$l#$e#I hope the next years would be more bountiful and maybe, we could have a little one of our own$h
